titleStmt.title: A compendious chronicle of the kingdom of Portugal, from Alfonso, the first King, to Alfonso the Sixth, now reigning together with a cosmographical description of the dominions of Portugal / by John Dauncey.
titleStmt.author: Dauncey, John, fl. 1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Johnson for Francis Kirkman [and 2 others],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
